h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-White (Round Two)
content: When Non-White finally falls, you'll be able to claim the Non-White Spirit from him, and also make use of the **Meditation Spot** nearby to claim a free Skill Point.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-White.md', within the main section titled 'Non-White', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-White (Round Two)'.
The content is as follows:
When Non-White finally falls, you'll be able to claim the Non-White Spirit from him, and also make use of the **Meditation Spot** nearby to claim a free Skill Point.
